attributes.action: Investigate the cost of political correctness on the economy.
attributes.additional_details: An independent inquiry such as a Royal Commision into whether political correctness is hurting the real economy. Are government officials being employed because of their ability or to get politically correct results. A parents wants the best teacher but if a 2nd rate teacher is being employed to keep  statistics up it will hurt the economy as the education of child will not be as good and in a knowledge based economy education is everything.
